title: Welcome to Madeira360
description: Your Madeira guide — tips and local offers

body.raw:
<Callout>This is a starter project. Content and offers will grow over time.</Callout>

# Welcome to Madeira360

Madeira360 is your compact guide for Madeira: routes, spots, transfers, and local offers.

<CTA title="Get the free mini guide" description="1–2 emails per week. No spam." href="/en" buttonText="Subscribe" />
